import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, Typography, } from "@material-tailwind/react"; import PersonalDetails from './PersonalDetails'; import EducationalDetails from './EducationDetails'; import AcademicDetails from './AcademicDetails'; export default function Profile() { const [active, setActive] = useState("personal"); return (
setActive("personal")} className="w-60 cursor-pointer h-30 bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-400 to-purple-500 flex text-white"> Personal Details setActive("educational")} className="w-60 cursor-pointer h-30 bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-400 to-purple-500 flex text-white ml-10"> Educational Details setActive("academic")} className="w-60 cursor-pointer h-30 bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-400 to-purple-500 flex text-white ml-10"> Academic Details
{active === "personal" && } {active === "educational" && } {active === "academic" && }
); }
